DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.IPCam.<VALUES>: An IPCam job that generates/updates an IPTV playlist and EPG from camera streams and can optionally manage an xTeVe service install/service file.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.IPCam.<VALUES>.ServiceURL.<VA: Base URL where the service will be reachable (used when printing links/instructions).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.IPCam.<VALUES>.PlaylistFile.<: Path to the generated M3U playlist file.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.IPCam.<VALUES>.Username.<VALU: Username used in generated playlist URLs if required by your setup (or a label xTeVe uses).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.IPCam.<VALUES>.EPGFile.<VALUE: Path to the generated EPG XML file.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.IPCam.<VALUES>.RestartService: If true, restart the service after updates so changes take effect.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.IPCam.<VALUES>.ServiceTemplat: Source path to a systemd service template file shipped with your project (blank if not managing a service).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.IPCam.<VALUES>.ServiceDest.<V: Destination path for the systemd service file (blank if not managing a service).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.IPCam.<VALUES>.DownloadURL.<V: Direct download URL for the xTeVe (or related) binary archive used by your tool (blank if not installing).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.IPCam.<VALUES>.InstallDir.<VA: Directory where the tool installs/extracts the binary (blank if not installing).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.IPCam.<VALUES>.BinaryName.<VA: Name of the installed executable file (blank if not installing).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.IPCam.<VALUES>.SymlinkPath.<V: Path to create a symlink to the executable (blank if not installing).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.IPCam.<VALUES>.TmpDir.<VALUES: Temporary working directory used for downloads/extracts.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.IPCam.<VALUES>.Cameras.Name.<: Friendly channel name for the camera (shown in playlist/UI).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.IPCam.<VALUES>.Cameras.URL.<V: Full stream URL for the camera (RTSP/HTTP/HLS) that your player can open.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.IPCam.<VALUES>.Cameras.Descri: Optional description text for the camera/channel.
